detail_desc: Slim-fit chinos in washed, stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly and button. Diagonal side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Bikini briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back.
Sleeveless top in printed cotton jersey with frill-trimmed shoulder straps.
Cotton twill shorts with an adjustable elasticated waist, side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and a zip fly with a button.
Wide trousers in a wool weave with a high waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener, side pockets, welt back pockets and wide, straight legs with creases.
Metal and plastic hoop earrings in various designs. Length from 2.5 cm to 4 cm.
Elasticated satin scrunchie with long ties.

Long, wide dress in a softly draping weave with a deep, flounce-trimmed V-neck and flounces at the waist. Gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Concealed hook-and-eye fastener at the top, a seam at the waist and a gathered, flared skirt. Unlined.
Soft velour bootees with embroidery and appliqués, foldover ribbing at the top and jersey linings. Soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
Fully lined bikini with a lace pattern. Top with narrow shoulder straps and three layers of frills. Bottoms with a frill trim at the top.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Jumper in a cable-knit viscose blend with a V-neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved dresses in soft cotton jersey with a seam at the hips and flared skirt. One dress is patterned.
Jacket with a lined hood and soft, thermal fleece inside. Zip down the front, side pockets and ribbed cuffs. Slightly longer at the back.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Small shoulder bag with a zipped outer compartment, a zip at the top, a narrow shoulder strap and an inner compartment. Lined. Size approx. 5.5x14x18.5 cm.
Sleeveless blouse in a crêpe weave with a small stand-up collar with an opening and button at the front, pin-tucks at the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Calf-length dress in an airy, patterned, pleated weave with a small V-neck at the top and tie-top spaghetti shoulder straps. Round cut at the back, seam at the waist with a drawstring that can be pulled at the sides and a wide, voluminous skirt with a wide flounce at the hem. Asymmetric hem, longer at the back. Unlined.
Long T-shirt in jersey with sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Short dress in a patterned weave with a round neckline, long sleeves, a gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.

Parka in water-repellent cotton with a detachable, lined hood and zip down the front. Flap front pockets with a hook and loop fastener and elasticated cuffs. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Studio Collection. Straight-cut, single-breasted blazer in a jacquard weave with a slight shimmer. Notch lapels, a chest pocket, large patch front pockets and a jetted inner pocket. Defined shoulders and extra-long sleeves with buttons at the cuffs. Double back vent. Lined. Studio Collection AW20 is a tribute to the rebellious, fearless individual who dares to break the mould – an individual who plays between the extremes and finds their style amongst the androgynous, eclectic and creative.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Bucket hat in cotton chambray with an embroidered motif on the front. Lined. Width of brim 4.5 cm.
Short, sleeveless dress in velour with a V-neck at the back, seam at the waist and gently flared skirt. Unlined.

Ankle-length trousers in twill made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend. High waist with pleats and a detachable tie belt resembling a rope and a zip fly with two buttons. Pockets in the side seams, welt back pockets and tapered legs with creases.
Blouse in a cotton crêpe weave with a grandad collar, button placket and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Rounded hem, longer at the back.
Pyjama bottoms in cotton flannel with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and tapered legs.
Knee-length dress in satin with a V-neck opening and narrow ties at the front, cap sleeves, an elasticated seam at the waist and softly draping skirt. Unlined.
Top in soft jersey made from a viscose blend with a print motif and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Long, fitted, double-breasted jacket in pattern-weave fabric with notch lapels. Welt front pockets with a flap, a fake welt pocket at the top, and decorative buttons at the cuffs. Lined.
Short-sleeved sports top in fast-drying, functional fabric with a ventilating mesh yoke and back.
Calf-length skirt in a silk blend with a high waist and concealed zip in one side.

Double-breasted trenchcoat in a felted wool blend with a loose yoke at the back and a collar with a hook-and-eye fastening. Shoulder tabs with a button, a detachable tie belt at the waist, front pockets, two inner pockets and a lined single back vent. Lined. The wool content of the trenchcoat is recycled.
Earrings with plastic beads and tassels. Length 8.5 cm.

Boiler suit in soft, washed denim with a collar, concealed buttons down the front and a detachable tie belt at the waist. One chest pocket, side pockets, back pockets, long sleeves with a concealed press-stud at the cuffs, and gently tapered legs.
Long-sleeved top in soft fabric with a print motif, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Thin, elasticated bracelets with beads in glass, plastic and metal.
Ankle boots with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles. Heel 8 cm.
Short, fitted cardigan in a soft rib knit with a V-neck, buttons down the front and long sleeves.
5-pocket trousers in washed, superstretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs.
Cardigan in soft fleece with a hood and side pockets. No fasteners.

Chinos in stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and welt back pockets with a button. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Knee-length dress in jersey crêpe with a boat neck and 3/4-length sleeves. Seam at the waist, decorative seam at the front and a slit at the hem.
Trainers in imitation leather with a padded top edge and tongue, and lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Fitted V-neck top in ribbed jersey with a wrapover front and short sleeves.
Sports shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and reflective detail.
Ballet pumps with fine details, rounded toes and a strap over the foot. Satin linings and insoles and finely fluted soles. Heel 0.4 cm.
Platform ankle boots with a zip in the side. Faux fur linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles. Platform 4 cm.
Fitted short-sleeved top in slub jersey made from organic cotton with a round neck and rounded hem.
Metal earrings with plastic pendants. Length 6.5 cm.
Small umbrella with a telescopic handle and a fabric wrist strap. Size 7x15.5 cm folded.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with elastication at the top and overlocked, scalloped edges. Extra low waist and cutaway coverage at the back.
Boxy-style jumper in a rib-knit cotton blend with a turtle neck, low dropped shoulders with pleated shoulder seams and long balloon sleeves. Wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Leggings in washed stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and raw-edge hems.

Calf-length dress in satin with inset elasticated trims around the collar, shoulders, waist and sleeves for a gathered effect. Stand up collar with buttons at the back of the neck and long, wide sleeves that taper to the cuffs. Seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Satin-lined bodice and skirt.
Non-wired bras in soft cotton jersey with padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Cropped sleeveless top in a cotton weave with a broderie anglaise flounce at the front. Gentle V-neck, wide shoulder straps and wide ties at the back. Lined.
Short shorts in a crêpe weave with a long, sewn-in skirt in gently crinkled chiffon that is open at the front. Concealed zip at the back.
Vest tops in soft jersey with narrow shoulder straps, a small scalloped trim at the top and a decorative bow at the front.
Short, off-the-shoulder dress in an airy cotton weave with elastication and a wide flounce at the top. Elasticated seam at the waist and a flounce at the hem. Unlined.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of leggings in soft, striped organic cotton. Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with concealed press-studs on the shoulders and appliqués at the bottom. Leggings in jersey with an elasticated waist.
Top in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket, contrasting colour stripes down the sides and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Cardigan in a soft, loose knit with low dropped shoulders, wide sleeves with close-fitting cuffs, and front pockets. No buttons.
Short-sleeved dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a square neckline, smocking at the top and a flared skirt.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. High, adjustable elasticated waist, a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Shaftless socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend. The cotton content of the socks is organic. The polyester content of the socks is recycled.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre and lace with ties, a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short, gently fitted dungaree dress in woven fabric with buttons down the front, wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a seam at the waist.

Dress in soft viscose twill with a collar, buttons to the waist and flap chest pockets. Long sleeves with a tab and button, buttoned cuffs, a gathered seam at the waist and diagonal side pockets. Unlined.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Make-up bag in transparent plastic with a zip at the top. Size 11x16x28.5 cm.

Chiffon maxi dress with a lace bodice, boat neck and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Short cap sleeves with scalloped edges, a seam at the waist with a decorative grosgrain ribbon and a softly draping, pleated skirt. Concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastening in one side. Lined.
T-shirts in soft cotton jersey with narrow ribbing around the neckline. Press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Fitted jacket in woven fabric with a shawl collar and one button at the front. Welt front pockets with a flap, long sleeves with a decorative button at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.

Padded jacket in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with folded seams, a detachable, padded, lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Chest pocket, zipped front pockets, and inner ribbing and a tab with a hook and loop fastening at the cuffs. Rounded and longer at the back. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
